db:abstract.db:para: Provides classes to create and use state machines from SCXML files.

db:article.db:para: Provides classes to create and use state machines from SCXML files.

db:listitem.db:para: The QScxmlCppDataModel class is a C++ data model for a Qt SCXML state machine.
The QScxmlDataModel class is the data model base class for a Qt SCXML state machine.
The QScxmlEcmaScriptDataModel class is the ECMAScript data model for a Qt SCXML state machine.
The QScxmlError class describes the errors returned by the Qt SCXML state machine when parsing an SCXML file.
The QScxmlEvent class is an event for a Qt SCXML state machine.
The QScxmlEventFilter class is an event filter for an SCXML state machine.
The QScxmlNullDataModel class is the null data model for a Qt SCXML stateMachine
The QScxmlParser class is a parser for SCXML files.
The Loader class is a URI resolver and resource loader for an SCXML parser.
The QScxmlStateMachine class provides an interface to the state machines created from SCXML files.
